plot outline: A group of college students invent a chemical potion that makes them invisible. They use this invention to steal 10,000 crore (equivalent to 140 billion or US 1.9 billion in 2019) from Karishma (Kanishka Soni), who has an abundance of illegal wealth. Shankar Lal (Vivek), a CB-CID officer, must trace the money from the students, who are on the run.
title: Pathayeram Kodi
plot: A group of college students invent a chemical potion that makes them invisible. They use this invention to steal 10,000 crore (equivalent to 140 billion or US 1.9 billion in 2019) from Karishma (Kanishka Soni), who has an abundance of illegal wealth. Shankar Lal (Vivek), a CB-CID officer, must trace the money from the students, who are on the run.
